name: The Great Wobo Escape
summary:
"Main character in The Great Wobo Escape is robot named Wobo. He is alone, unarmed, and escaping for freedom, his only chance is to hide in shadows, use the environment to his favor and crush dieselpunk enemy robots. Stealth approach may quickly shift into fast-paced escape combined with creating diversion, causing chaos and avoiding tricky hazards.

The Great Wobo Escape combines stealth on mobile devices, with action-oriented gameplay and subtle sci-fi story (How much intelligent must robots become to deserve freedom?). Game is approachable by young audience. It aims to bring console-like experience to mobile players."
